name: shashlik
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an Eastern European or Asian dish consisting of pieces of meat and vegetables that have been put on a long, thin stick or metal rod and cooked together: I made some vegetable shashlik to serve as starters. Mains include chicken, pasta, and grilled lamb shashliks. The main course was a choice of mackerel curry or chicken shashlik.
More examplesFewer examplesShashlik is popular throughout Central Asia.In Georgia, they usually make their shashlik with beef rather than lamb.A little Turkish bistro that serves great shashlik has just opened in our town.The delegates met for a private discussion over shashlik.
